sentence0.sentece_text: Contractions were abolished by tetrodotoxin (1.6 microM).

sentence1.sentece_text: Apamin (300 nM) disrupted evoked peristaltic waves and significantly increased the rate-of-rise of the LM and CM contractions anal to a stimulus, and the LM oral to a stimulus.

sentence2.sentece_text: Nomega-nitro-L-arginine (100 microM), a nitric oxide synthesis inhibitor, had no overall significant effect on the characteristics of the LM and CM contractions, although on occasion an enhancement in their peak amplitude was noted.
